text:
This branch of the [[Unity]] of [[Riedra]] tends to the infrastructure
of the nation, construction, villages, bastions, roads, and
the [[monolith|hanbalani alta]]s. The builders and architects of the Sturdy Wall are proud of their role in building the wondrous [[hanbalani alta]]s.

The Sturdy Wall is based in the [[bastion|bastion city]] of [[Dul Natath]]
under the leadership of Lord [[Laneth]].
title: Sturdy Wall
